author: mrmitch
title: Inexpensive addition to the Fire Department
review: Years ago I picked up a few of these small sets for stocking stuffers, they were only 3 fo $5.00. Simple set with a low piece count but for the money a good deal. The boat is out of scale for most of the other Fire Department, yet it is still worth picking up if you can find it.

author: Quirrelthesquirrel
title: Cheap and good
review:
This set my brother bought from a LEGO shop in 2007 for only $3 AUD! and later he gave it to me. This set has go some of my favourite LEGO pieces in it like the walkie talkie and the PFD. I also like the blue pieces and this et goes good with LEGO city sets. The guy"s head is also cool.

Bye
